## Dataset
```{r dataset}
    df = jeudedonnes()
    visit_sequence = c(11,16,22,2,23,24,18,19,1,17,15,21,12,13,14,20,6,3,9,4,10,8,5,7)
    regles = list(marital = "age < 18")
    regles_val = list(marital = "SINGLE")
```

## ANOVA
```{r anova}
    ml1 = lm(socprof ~region * edu, data = df)
```
